ygData.subject: Question about the Battle Drum
ygData.msgSnippet: I must have missed it earlier but what are the stats on the battle drum?  I think I remember reading that it increased your speed while playing Selos but I
ygData.messageBody:
I must have missed it earlier but what are the stats on the battle drum? I
think I remember reading that it increased your speed while playing Selos
but I haven't seen any other bonuses it confers. What other songs does it
also improve?

Thanks
Galtin of E'ci

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Lost Child [SMTP:lostchild@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, August 11, 1999 4:08 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Question about the Battle Drum
>
> From: "Lost Child" <lostchild@...>
>
> On most servers, 500pp is way too much for a battle drum. A fair price
> would be somewhere around 200 to maybe 300pp.
>
> >>I've got a question for the higher level bards on the list. Just how
> much
> >should a battle drum cost? Based on the stats I've seen I think I'd be
> >willing to pay 500pp, but at the same time there's no need to get ripped
> >off. :) What say ye, great bards?
>
>
